General.Name: Shenzhen Farben Information Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Farben Information Technology Co.,Ltd. provides software technology services and solutions in China. It offers solutions in the areas of personalized systems, data warehouse upgrade, data management analysis, E-commerce website, data asset management, and big data platform building solutions. The company also offers IT, consulting, cloud, and product development services. Shenzhen Farben Information Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Block B, Yudashun Science and Technology Park, Shenzhen, China, 518000

AddressData.Street: Block B, Yudashun Science and Technology Park
